tickets-are-live.content: Our ticket schedule is now live on Eventbrite! We are doing three ticket releases, and the first one will be on October 27th. Do not miss out!
tickets-are-live.title: Tickets are live!

call-for-speakers-open.brief: Our submission form for speakers is officially open! Please send us your proposal today.
call-for-speakers-open.content:
GDG Glasgow is proud to announce that the submission form for speakers is open! We have created a short form on Sessionize and invite you to fill it out to get a chance to speak at our DevFest this November. We welcome any topics. We want speakers that are passionate, that can grab the attention of the audience right away and hold it until the end, and leave them wanting more. Please note: the call for speakers form closes on the 31st of October, 2018.
Submit a proposal
call-for-speakers-open.title: Speaker form open!

c4p.brief: We are looking for speakers for GDG DevFest Glasgow
c4p.content:
We are looking for speakers for GDG DevFest Glasgow. Our focus is the content. **We’re looking for speakers like you**, who are ready to rock the stage and deliver the best talk or workshop in the field.  

Why is it cool to speak at the DevFest? You will get to interact with an incredible audience hungry to learn, network with others, enjoy the lovely city of Glasgow, and work on yourself. Our form is not yet open but will be soon. If you would like to contact us for more information or submit a talk to discuss it, our email is [gdgglasgow@gmail.com](mailto:gdgglasgow@gmail.com).
c4p.title: We're looking for speakers

dfua18-announced.brief: GDG Glasgow has begun planning DevFest 2018!.
dfua18-announced.content: It is official. GDG DevFest Glasgow 2018 is in motion. We do not have any details yet but will update this page as well as our social media once we confirm everything. Follow us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/gdgglasgow/) and join [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/Glasgow-New-Technology-Meetup/) to keep up with announcements and conference updates.
dfua18-announced.title: Announcing GDG DevFest Glasgow 2018

thank-you.brief: Our team wants to thank our speakers, attendees, and partners who made GDG DevFest Glasgow 2017 possible
thank-you.content: We want to thank one more time our partners, who made [DevFest 2017](https://df17.gdg-glasgow.com/) possible! THANK YOU for being creative and motivating our participants, THANK YOU for your workshops and expertise. Again, THANK YOU all, you are amazing! Hope you join us next year! With love, GDG Glasgow Team
thank-you.title: Thank you all for your support
